title: Chapel Arts Cafe
typeOfFood: Lacto, Ovo, Western, Beer/Wine, Take-out, Bakery, British, English, European
description: Makes food and cakes including: continental mixed platters, flatbreads, salads, soups, large range of hot and cold drinks, local beer and wine. Has gluten free cakes but does use dairy and/or egg. The cafe is also used as a gallery space for local artists to exhibit their work.
streetAddress: St James's Memorial Hall, Lower Borough Walls
